content.prompt: The sentiments in the source most directly reflect which of the following purposes of Harlem Renaissance art?

choices.label: The expression of racial separatism that was prominent in the 1920s
The exploration of African Americans’ connection to Africa
The protesting of government actions that marginalized African Americans
The belief in African Americans’ assimilation into white culture

topic.text: 3.13: Envisioning Africa in Harlem Renaissance Poetry

skill.text: 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
